item.title: Building an Interactive Risk Matrix using R
item.description: What is Risk Matrix ? Risk Matrix is an illustration to show the organization risk apatite, and draw the border line (threshold) between risk levels. The green area is where you want your risk to be eventually. so… risk matrix in the context of this post is a reporting tool. Sometime the risk matrix is defined as a tool to evaluate risk… and that is a dangerous thing to do (reference)
